alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenwood Lake, or near Warwick, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, West Point, Chester, Greenwood Lake, Harriman, Kiryas Joel, Woodbury, Washingtonville, Firthcliffe, Vails Gate, Cornwall On Hudson, Highland Mills, and Central Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
